title: What is NigedEase?
content: NigedEase is an AI-powered business management platform developed by Addis Ababa Science and Technology University. It helps Ethiopian businesses manage inventory, sales, and finances efficiently, replacing outdated manual systems with a centralized, cloud-based solution.

title: Key Features
content: NigedEase offers real-time inventory tracking, sales monitoring, financial forecasting, receipt validation, and multi-branch management. It supports role-based access for Super Admins, Admins, Branch Managers, and Employees, ensuring secure and tailored access to data.

title: Benefits for Ethiopian Businesses
content: NigedEase reduces manual record-keeping, minimizes errors, and saves time. Its AI features, like receipt validation and sales forecasting, help businesses make data-driven decisions and improve scalability across multiple branches.

title: Receipt Validation
content: NigedEase validates receipts by cross-checking them with sales and inventory records. Businesses can upload receipt images or enter details manually, and the system flags discrepancies for review.

title: Multi-Branch Support
content: NigedEase allows businesses with multiple branches to sync data in real-time. Each branch can manage its inventory and sales, while admins oversee all branches from a central dashboard.

title: AI-Powered Automation
content: The platform uses AI to automate tasks like low-stock alerts, financial projections, and customer support via a chatbot. This reduces manual work and helps businesses focus on growth.

title: Who Can Use NigedEase?
content: NigedEase is designed for small and medium-sized businesses in Ethiopia, such as retail shops, restaurants, and startups, looking to modernize their operations.

title: Do I Need Technical Skills to Use NigedEase?
content: No, NigedEase is designed to be user-friendly for all business owners, even if you have no technical background. The dashboard is simple, and our support team is always available to help you get started.

title: Can I Access NigedEase on My Phone?
content: Yes! NigedEase is mobile-friendly. You can access it from your smartphone or tablet to check sales, manage inventory, and monitor your business anytime, anywhere.

title: Is My Business Data Secure?
content: Absolutely. NigedEase uses modern encryption and cloud security practices to keep your business data safe. Role-based access ensures that only the right people see the right information.

title: How Is NigedEase Different from Other Systems?
content: NigedEase is tailored for Ethiopian businesses, with built-in support for local needs like receipt validation, branch-level tracking, and AI-based forecasting. It's more than just software — it’s a smart assistant for your business.

title: Can I Try NigedEase Before Committing?
content: Yes. You can explore a demo or free trial to understand how it works before fully signing up. Contact our support team to request access.

title: Does NigedEase Work Offline?
content: NigedEase is a cloud-based platform, so it requires an internet connection for most features. However, we are exploring offline capabilities for essential tasks in the future.

title: How Do I Get Started with NigedEase?
content: Simply visit our website and sign up for an account. Our team will help you onboard, import your data, and set up your business profile. No complicated setup needed!
